Title.evidence: This study was conducted as a case report, not a randomised controlled trial.

Trial_Design.evidence: This study was conducted as a case report, not a randomised controlled trial.

Participants.evidence: The patient, a 75-year-old male, initially underwent wide local excision for secondary EMPD associated with urothelial carcinoma.

Intervention.evidence: The intervention involved Mohs micrographic surgery (MMS), which is known for its high precision in margin control.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: This study was conducted as a case report, not a randomised controlled trial.

Blinding.evidence: This study was conducted as a case report, not a randomised controlled trial.

Number_Randomised.evidence: This study was conducted as a case report, not a randomised controlled trial.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The patient experienced no recurrence over a one-year follow-up period after MMS.
